resume.statement: I am a Web Applications Engineer with a background in design; a creator of wireframes and a builder of interfaces. I design web applications from the ground up and bring them to life in Javascript, HTML & CSS.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.description: Took over management of a team of contractors to deliver a React.js web application on time and to the specifications of an external client. I planned and delegated tasks, lead retrospectives, contributed to and improved the project's codebase. Most importantly, I performed an overhaul of the entire application interface to meet State mandated accessibility requirements.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Took over management of a team of contractors to deliver a React.js web application on time and to the specifications of an external client. I planned and delegated tasks, lead retrospectives, contributed to and improved the project's codebase. Most importantly, I performed an overhaul of the entire application interface to meet State mandated accessibility requirements.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
experience.description: Worked collaboratively to build new features and maintained the FarmLogs web application & marketing website. I curated our UI components and LESS styles; carried out major refactors and redesigns of core component systems like navigation, datepickers, tooltips and popovers. Worked with Product & Design to break projects down, iterate during development and deliver on time.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Eliminated technical debt and created new interfaces for the AdAdapted, PHP-based, web application. Also maintained various additional projects, including a documentation website, static content pages and various interactive demo prototypes.

experience.title: Web Designer & Developer
experience.description: Mobile first, responsive site design and consulting for individuals and small businesses.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Responsible for the design, implementation & maintenance of all interfaces for the Orderv, PHP web application & marketing website.

experience.title: Interface Designer & Front-end Developer
experience.description: PHP, Javascript/jQuery, HTML & CSS/Sass development & interface design for in-house customer support application.

experience.title: Web Designer & Administrator
experience.employer: University of Michigan College of Engineering
experience.description: Template development, debugging and Content Management for the Michigan Engineering website.
